title: Got a gemstone from hextech crafting, now it is gone
body: So a while ago, I opened 20+ hextech crates, and I got a gemstone from one of them, my first gemstone ever, and now it's just gone, it's not in the materials section, it just got erased from my account, and I got no idea why it got erased.

replies.body: It sounds weird that a gemstone would just disappear, so I took a look into this for you to find out what happened.  The last gemstone I see was obtained back on the first of October.  Just a few minutes later, that gemstone was used to forge a hextech chest and key.  Opening that chest resulted in a summoner icon and some orange essences.  I wasn't able to find anything out of the ordinary, but I hope that helps clear things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=J7IorA34,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-04T17:08:31.367+0000)
>
> It sounds weird that a gemstone would just disappear, so I took a look into this for you to find out what happened.  The last gemstone I see was obtained back on the first of October.  Just a few minutes later, that gemstone was used to forge a hextech chest and key.  Opening that chest resulted in a summoner icon and some orange essences.  I wasn't able to find anything out of the ordinary, but I hope that helps clear things up!

Thank you very much for the answer! This did help clear things up, thank you.
